basic-Desc1: You can control your basic store data from here
color-desc: You can change your store colors from here
whatsappHint: Make sure to add an active WhatsApp number to make it easier for customers to contact you directly.
socialLinksHint: Add links to your store's social media pages to help increase your followers.
linksValidityHint: Ensure that the links you've added are correct and working properly.
updateHint: Keep your contact information updated in case it changes.
